title: Does Travis Kelce Have Any Tattoos? Fans Are Wondering
description: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been all that people can talk about ever since the singer started to be a regular at the Chiefs games (and sat with the football player's mom). Their romance, which presumably began sometime around September 2023, has been a whirlwind to watch, with each star making headlines every time they supported the other's career endeavors. Kelce accompanied Swift on The Eras Tour and Swift followed Kelce all the way to the Super Bowl where his team secured a win. Naturally, this has led to an influx of new football fans curious about Swift's potential beau - more specifically, Kecle's tattoo collection. Searches for "Travis Kelce tattoos" have reached new heights, as people clamor to learn more about the three-time Super Bowl champion. Though he is well-known for expressing himself via his fashion choices, Kelce has no publicly known tattoos at this time. in a July 2024 episode of Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce's podcast, "New Heights," the two talked about how they had previously discussed getting a family crest, but did not have any current plans to get any ink. Still, that isn't to say that there aren't any Kelce-inspired designs out there. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Travis Kelce (@killatrav) Famously, after losing a bet to both Kelce and his teammate Patrick Mahomes, musician Post Malone tattooed both their signatures on his arm backstage at a concert. "He has a tattoo artist literally in the room," Mahomes told "GQ about the ordeal." "I'm like, 'Dude, you do not actually have to get a tattoo of our autographs.'" It's not clear whether Kelce has any interest in getting some body art of his own; Swift's tattoo collection is similarly nonexistent. But who knows what the future holds for our favorite it-couple. Ariel Baker is the assistant editor for PS Beauty. Her areas of expertise include celebrity news, beauty trends, and product reviews. She has additional bylines with Essence and Forbes Vetted.
author: Ariel Baker
excerpt: Fans are wondering about Travis Kelce’s tattoos amid his relationship with Taylor Swift. Learn about the star’s body-art collection here.
text: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been all that people can talk about ever since the singer started to be a regular at the Chiefs games (and sat with the football player's mom). Their romance, which presumably began sometime around September 2023, has been a whirlwind to watch, with each star making headlines every time they supported the other's career endeavors. Kelce accompanied Swift on The Eras Tour and Swift followed Kelce all the way to the Super Bowl where his team secured a win. Naturally, this has led to an influx of new football fans curious about Swift's potential beau — more specifically, Kecle's tattoo collection. Searches for "Travis Kelce tattoos" have reached new heights, as people clamor to learn more about the three-time Super Bowl champion. Though he is well-known for expressing himself via his fashion choices, Kelce has no publicly known tattoos at this time. in a July 2024 episode of Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce's podcast, "New Heights," the two talked about how they had previously discussed getting a family crest, but did not have any current plans to get any ink. Still, that isn't to say that there aren't any Kelce-inspired designs out there. Famously, after losing a bet to both Kelce and his teammate Patrick Mahomes, musician Post Malone tattooed both their signatures on his arm backstage at a concert. "He has a tattoo artist literally in the room," Mahomes told "GQ about the ordeal." "I'm like, 'Dude, you do not actually have to get a tattoo of our autographs.'" It's not clear whether Kelce has any interest in getting some body art of his own; Swift's tattoo collection is similarly nonexistent. But who knows what the future holds for our favorite it-couple. html:
Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been all that people can talk about ever since the singer started to be a regular at the Chiefs games (and sat with the football player's mom). Their romance, which presumably began sometime around September 2023, has been a whirlwind to watch, with each star making headlines every time they supported the other's career endeavors. Kelce accompanied Swift on The Eras Tour and Swift followed Kelce all the way to the Super Bowl where his team secured a win. Naturally, this has led to an influx of new football fans curious about Swift's potential beau — more specifically, Kecle's tattoo collection.

Searches for "Travis Kelce tattoos" have reached new heights, as people clamor to learn more about the three-time Super Bowl champion. Though he is well-known for expressing himself via his fashion choices, Kelce has no publicly known tattoos at this time. in a July 2024 episode of Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce's podcast, "New Heights," the two talked about how they had previously discussed getting a family crest, but did not have any current plans to get any ink.

Still, that isn't to say that there aren't any Kelce-inspired designs out there.

Famously, after losing a bet to both Kelce and his teammate Patrick Mahomes, musician Post Malone tattooed both their signatures on his arm backstage at a concert. "He has a tattoo artist literally in the room," Mahomes told "GQ about the ordeal." "I'm like, 'Dude, you do not actually have to get a tattoo of our autographs.'"

It's not clear whether Kelce has any interest in getting some body art of his own; Swift's tattoo collection is similarly nonexistent. But who knows what the future holds for our favorite it-couple.

Ariel Baker is the assistant editor for PS Beauty. Her areas of expertise include celebrity news, beauty trends, and product reviews. She has additional bylines with Essence and Forbes Vetted.
